storyInfo: Lemuen's investigation of the explosion leads her to the Shrine of Nurtury, but the Matriarch rejects her offer to help with the Shrine of Nurtury's security.

attributes.content: Salve, Cardinal Velliv, it's been a while.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Not 'cardinal' anymore. I'm just an ordinary clerk in the Shrine of Nurtury now.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Just 'Velliv', then? Anyway, it seems like your fingerprints are all over it.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: The security measures I saw on my way in from the streets. They could go toe-to-toe with the Pontifica Cohors.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I have to earn my keep, after all.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Anyway, it looks like I guessed right.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It was indeed you who came to review our security... even though this is a job usually reserved for Notarial Hall executors, or the gun-knights and Pontifica Cohors.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I'm still investigating the bombing that happened a couple of days ago. I'm not exactly an outsider.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I wasn't instructed to take the bomb investigation into account when planning security. Besides, your investigation hasn't exactly turned up anything concrete, has it?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Unless you mean to tell me you came because it was Andoain who was attacked?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Are you going to chide me that I should be thinking of the whole Holy City as a cardinal of the Seventh Tribunal, and not about my personal relationships?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: We know just what kind of person you are.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Sharp, astute, decisive, all traits that served you well at the consistory...
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: But we also know when these virtues of yours are most prominently displayed.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I remember the reasons why you joined the Pontifica Cohors commandos, Cardinal Lemuen. I read that report.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Hah. Do you really? I've forgotten.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You didn't really have any interest in the commandos. You just went to see Fiammetta, didn't you?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: And Andoain.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Really? That I didn't know. I thought you met after you joined the commandos.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: We met before that.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It seemed like he had come from a far away place, walking on foot. His clothes were tattered, and he himself was just as ragged.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: He sat on a bench in front of the chapel, still and unmoving, looking more like a statue than the actual statues of the saints on the roadside.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: That was the first time Mostima and I saw him.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: We met Fiammetta at the midnight movies. We hit it off quickly.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Andoain had trouble fitting in, having grown up outside the Holy City. Fiammetta, stubborn girl that she is, was in another one of those fights with her grandpa... Mostima and I wanted to see them.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: They didn't know each other beforehand, and the other Sanktas probably didn't intend to isolate them, but either way, the end result was—
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The two of them were the only ones left behind in the rubber-bullet roulette that was the commandos' initiation.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: And so you beat up everyone else on the scene...
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You and Mostima filled out your applications right there, becoming the last four-man squad at that initiation.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You ended up being the most active and most coordinated squad on the force, until the incident...
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: There is a lot I admire about you, Lemuen, but I must remind you... as a cardinal, the Holy City must be your first, foremost, and only concern.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: To me, the Holy City begins with a long list of familiar names.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: So much for reminiscing.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The Seventh Tribunal knows our duty. If you really think of yourself as an ordinary clerk, then maybe I should pay a visit to the Matriarch personally.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: She's right up ahead, isn't she?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Lemuen spots the one she came to see.
The golden-haired Sankta stands under a porch. She is praying, anxious; her breathing is rapid, and she trembles visibly...
Lemuen can feel herself overwhelmed by her counterpart's raging emotions.
Matriarch?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I overheard your conversation with Velliv, Cardinal Lemuen... pardon my inability to converse calmly at this time.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: What's in there?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: A Sarkaz mother.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: She spent much time in the wilderness, and declined food for two days after she arrived... she is not in good shape. Our Nurturers are doing their best.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: She suffers from fear and anxiety. She does not want to give in to the pain, and continues her struggle to stay awake...
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: She is praying, awake, praying that her child will be born safely.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: All I can do is empathize and pray with her.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: You can empathize with a Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Yes, Cardinal.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: As you worry for my outpouring of emotion. It is as clear as the innate empathy between you and I.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: 'Empathy'...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: A blessing that the Lord has bestowed upon me, perhaps, in place of my sight... or perhaps simply because this place was built by Laterano to welcome new life.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Here our faith is strengthened and expanded. Here, there are no barriers, no limits.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Putting it in that light, it is our own people who need this place the most.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Sunlight shines through the stained glass, illuminating the empty and solemn hall.
The massive statue stands with its palms together, looking down on the two tiny Sanktas beneath it.
It's certainly a special place.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I've seen plenty of statues in all sorts of poses, holding a gun and ready to shoot. But it's the first time I've seen one like this, and it takes some getting used to.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Compared to the so-called 'Lateran statues' that line the hills of Bolívar or the shores of Iberia, the statues seen in Laterano are the more incomprehensible, Cardinal.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Paradise has shaped our faith, so peculiar that it has become somewhat distorted.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: The souls of the living praying for survival, as they traverse Catastrophe and suffering... such is the most basic face of faith.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: M-Matriarch. Blessings to you.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: The mother's condition has stabilized. We have given her medicine and nutrition. She is sleeping now.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: That is comforting to hear.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: She is expecting soon. Please keep a close eye on her, and do not let yourselves grow complacent.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Yes, Matriarch.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Praise be to the Lord.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: I can feel the relief and joy coming from the bottom of your heart.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Thank you for your companionship, Cardinal. I hope empathy did not cause my anxiety to affect you.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: I'm not so weak. Besides, your words were inspiring, to an extent.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You mentioned that you only came here later?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Long had I wandered the wilderness, my companions withered in the mud...
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: In order to find Laterano?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: No, at the time I never imagined that there would be such a city upon this land.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: But our shared vision finally helped me locate it.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Our encounter here and now was written in fate.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: It is a blessing to be able to serve Laterano and my kindred, after all this time, frail as I may be.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: I have a friend who works here. He also came from afar...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: In Laterano today and Laterano tomorrow, everyone must and will find their own place and play their own roles... only then can we hope to fend off calamity.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: It seems we've gotten sidetracked.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: If there has been an attack on the Nurturers, the Seventh Tribunal is happy to work with the Shrine of Nurtury in implementing security measures, to ensure that the Nativity goes off without a hitch.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I understand your worry for your friend, and your curiosity about this shrine.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: As I said, though, we must all find our own place and play our own roles.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: And there I was, thinking our chat was going nicely.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Looks like I've been summarily rejected, haven't I?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry for your loss.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I should have brought a few wheat stalks, if I only knew this had happened.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Wheat stalks?
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: For funerals at the Landen Monastery, we weave a laurel out of wheat stalks and place it upon the departed's coffin.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: That way, the soul of the departed will be comforted by the scent of bread and beer on the other side.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Thank you, kind sister.
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: My brother and I were exiled by the General Chamber of Commerce because we were afflicted with Oripathy, and did not have the skill to participate in knightsports.
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: We came all this way to Laterano, only for his condition to worsen and take his life...
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: But the Curia helped bury him, allowing him to die with dignity... there was even a passing Sankta who played a requiem for him.
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Was that Sankta a female with long, straight black hair, playing a cello with an unusual shape?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Er, yes.
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: She played for you?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Were you subject to any hallucinations, or any psychological discomfort?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What do mean by discomfort? I know it made me cry. It was my brother, after all...
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: Senior Executor, I thought we agreed that I would do the questioning...
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Other executors from Notarial Hall will soon be here to take these refugees to Pagus Ambrosius. We do not have much time.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: They are not suspected of any crime. I did not find complex interrogation techniques to be necessary.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I visited Lungmen and Victoria when I was promoting Landen Monastery, and I saw many people like them.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: They were forced to leave home due to unfortunate circumstances. Their previous dealings with the police have made them...
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Executors are more or less police, right?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Uh, there's no need. You guys just took in outsiders with Oripathy like us, even though I heard you used to kick your own Infected out.
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: So, right now, I don't have anything against the Lateran government. Besides, this gentleman here looks like a decent fellow...
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: Is there something wrong with the black-haired Sankta you were asking about?
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: Without permission, she left the monastery where she was under observation. We have tracked her here.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Sh-She's a prisoner? I thought she was an official from your, what's that, Sixth Tribunal?
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: Why did you think that?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: She asked us about the abbey after the funeral, whether there was any equipment in disrepair, any safety hazards, any supplies we were short on.
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: She made it a point to ask if anyone who recently entered Laterano had disappeared, especially any pregnant women...
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: (Doesn't sound like Arturia just happened to pass by...)
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: How did it go?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You know the answer.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The Matriarch's response was just like yours—'don't poke your head into other people's business.'
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I know you have good intentions, Lemuen, but you're also showing that you don't trust me.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I beg your understanding.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The Shrine of Nurtury, this great structure that casts a shadow over Laterano, which no one's quite sure when it came to be...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You, Reverend Patrizion and the Matriarch promise that this will be the birthplace of the future. Even the suspect behind the bombings seems interested in it.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: How can the Seventh Tribunal, responsible for intelligence and national security, ignore something so prominent?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Of course, I understand.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Excuse me.
attributes.name: Guiding Nurturer

attributes.content: The Nurturer leads a group past. Their footsteps echo through the empty hall.
The people in the procession come from many different races. None of them speak, but all glance up and down at this unfamiliar space.
Lemuen steps aside to let them pass.
What is it, Cardinal Lemuen?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: What I mean is, curiosity killed the Feline. I guess I should expect a complaint from my predecessor if I continue to insist.
attributes.name: Lemuen
